entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-24
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CSharpSyncNamespaceCodeRefactoringProvider does not recognize .editorconfig's csharp_style_namespace_declarations #65603
  • Compilers generated code isn't validated in CI when only source generators are changed #65602
  • [C#] IDE0055 - ident_size 4 is ignored for line of Constructor Initializer #65601
  • Crash inside FlowAnalysis #65597
  • Excessive Roslyn computation in 17.4 possibly related to refs #65596
    17.5
  • [C#] Stack Overflow when a method pointer type appears in an attribute #65594

Closed

  • `var` keyword colorized on the case `scoped var refStruct = expr;` #65403
    17.5
  • Generics implementations with nullable of non struct don't match type #65598
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33123.395 #65599

PullRequests

Created

  • Move "Unseal class" codefix to VerifyCS #65605
    Area-IDE, Community
  • More tests for an issue around constrained calls #65595
    Area-Compilers, Test

Merged

  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65604
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Work some 'scoped' issues on IDE #65407
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65600
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #65593
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Add capability to request fine grained DiagnosticKinds to diagnostic analyzer service #65583
    Area-Analyzers, Next

Updated

  • Support fine-grained diagnostic tagging. #65547
    Area-IDE
  • Rules missing documentation #62242
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Implement a new brokered service for passing project information #65592
    Area-IDE
